components.name: Gmail Tool
components.description: Handles the connection to the Gmail IMAP server, retrieves unread emails, and manages email actions such as labeling and deleting.

components.name: AI Agent
components.description: Utilizes language models to categorize emails, generate responses, and assign priorities based on content analysis.

components.name: Slack Notification Service
components.description: Sends notifications to a specified Slack channel for high-priority emails, enhancing user awareness and engagement.

components.name: Configuration Management
components.description: Manages application configuration, including API keys and user credentials, through environment variables.

data_flows.description: The Gmail Tool retrieves unread emails and sends them to the AI Agent for categorization and response generation.
The AI Agent sends notifications for high-priority emails to the Slack Notification Service for user alerts.
The Gmail Tool retrieves credentials and configuration settings from the Configuration Management component to establish a secure connection.

trust_boundaries.name: User Credentials Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Separates user credentials stored locally from external services like Gmail and Slack.
